info.title: Do Not Call Reported Calls
info.description: The Do Not Call (DNC) Reported Calls Data API endpoint provides data every weekday about Do Not Call and robocall complaints reported to the Federal Trade Commission. This data consists of information reported by consumers, including the telephone number originating the unwanted call, the date the complaint was created, the time the call was made, the consumer's city and state locations reported, the subject of the call, and whether the call was a robocall. The reported calls is not verified.

company-phone-number.description: The telephone number the unwanted call originated from.
company-phone-number.title: Company Phone Number

created-date.description: The date/time the complaint was created. Timestamp format is ISO 8601. Example: 1997-07-16T19:20:30+01:00
created-date.title: Created Date

violation-date.description: The date/time the unwanted call was received. Timestamp format is ISO 8601.
violation-date.title: Violation Date

consumer-city.description: The city reported by the consumer who created the complaint.
consumer-city.title: Consumer City

consumer-area-code.description: The area code of the consumer that created the complaint.
consumer-area-code.title: Consumer Area Code

subject.description: The subject of the unwanted call.
subject.title: Subject

recorded-message-or-robocall.description: Indicates whether the unwanted call was a recorded message / robocall ("Y"), or not ("N").
recorded-message-or-robocall.title: Recorded Message Or Robocall

self.description: A link that pertains to this record.
self.title: Link

records-this-page.description: The number of records included in this response.
records-this-page.title: Records This Page

record-total.description: The total number of records found for the request.
record-total.title: Record Total

self.description: A link that pertains to this record.
self.title: Link

get.description: Returns a list of unverified complaints based on the filter parameters.

parameters.name: created_date
parameters.description: Filter records by a specific date that complaints were created during. For example, show all complaints created on February 26, 2020: 2020-02-26

parameters.name: created_date_from
parameters.description: Filter records by a range of dates/times that complaints were created. These filters must be used together. Can be combined with any one these filters: State, Area Code or Is Robocall. When combined with the state filter, an optional city filter can be added.

parameters.name: created_date_to
parameters.description: Filter records by a range of dates/times that complaints were created. These filters must be used together. Can be combined with any one these filters: State, Area Code or Is Robocall. When combined with the state filter, an optional city filter can be added.

parameters.name: violation_date
parameters.description: Filter records by a specific date that unwanted calls were received during. For example, show all unwanted calls received on February 26, 2020: 2020-02-26

parameters.name: violation_date_from
parameters.description: Filter records by a range of dates/times that violations were created. These filters must be used together. Can be combined with any one these filters: State, Area Code or Is Robocall. When combined with the state filter, an optional city filter can be added.

parameters.name: violation_date_to
parameters.description: Filter records by a range of dates/times that violations were created. These filters must be used together. Can be combined with any one these filters: State, Area Code or Is Robocall. When combined with the state filter, an optional city filter can be added.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter records by a state that complaints originated from. Can be combined with the city and Created Date From / Created Date To filters.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter records by a city that complaints originated from. This filter must be used together with the state filter. Can be combined with the Created Date From / Created Date To filters.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Filter records by the area code that complaints originated from. Can be combined with the Created Date From / Created Date To filters.

parameters.name: is_robocall
parameters.description: Filter by whether the unwanted call was a recorded message / robocall or not. Value must be either "true" or "false". Can be combined with the Created Date From / Created Date To filters.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort direction to use with the sort_by parameter.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to include in response. By default, the endpoint displays a maximum of 50 records per request. This is also the maximum value allowed.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset by a number of records, allowing a particular section of paginated results to be requested (use with the Items Per Page parameter).

company-phone-number.description: The telephone number the unwanted call originated from.
company-phone-number.title: Company Phone Number

created-date.description: The date/time the complaint was created. Timestamp format is ISO 8601. Example: 1997-07-16T19:20:30+01:00
created-date.title: Created Date

violation-date.description: The date/time the unwanted call was received. Timestamp format is ISO 8601.
violation-date.title: Violation Date

consumer-city.description: The city reported by the consumer who created the complaint.
consumer-city.title: Consumer City

consumer-area-code.description: The area code of the consumer that created the complaint.
consumer-area-code.title: Consumer Area Code

subject.description: The subject of the unwanted call.
subject.title: Subject

recorded-message-or-robocall.description: Indicates whether the unwanted call was a recorded message / robocall ("Y"), or not ("N").
recorded-message-or-robocall.title: Recorded Message Or Robocall

self.description: A link that pertains to this record.
self.title: Link

records-this-page.description: The number of records included in this response.
records-this-page.title: Records This Page

record-total.description: The total number of records found for the request.
record-total.title: Record Total

self.description: A link that pertains to this record.
self.title: Link

get.description: Returns a single unverified complaint by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the complaint.
